divs: sighting detailsaround 10 pm last night, i was driving south on hwy 347 to the town of maricopa. once i passed the hill with the "m" on it, near casa blanca road and the u.s. air force space command center, i noticed a large, bright red\orange orb of light hovering above the town, to the south west. i've seen these flights plenty of times above maricopa, but not for a couple months. i pulled over and stopped the car to determine if the light was moving, but it was staying stationary. i drove in to town and turned right at smith enke road, which is also hwy 238, to head in the direction of the light. i could see the light very clearly, and knew it was straight ahead on my left. once i got pretty close, i pulled over again to get my camera out of my trunk. unfortunately, it was too dark for my camera to focus, and my zoom was not strong enough to take a photo. it was late and dark and i had never been on that road before, so i took out the gps on my phone to see and remember where i was and to approximate the location of the light. i was stopped just a little west of the intersection of 238, green road, and w. smith enke road, with the light appearing just to the south west, approximately at w mcdavid road and white road. after i made note of the locations, the light disappeared. i got back in my car and tried to follow the neighboring roads that would lead to the direction of where i saw the light, but none of the roads were paved. i turned around and started my drive back to town. that was when i looked to my right, in the direction of where the light had been, and i saw on the ground something that looked like a portion, or top, of the red\orange light--only it appeared to be mostly below ground level and surrounded by many, smaller white lights. they were not blinking, but there were many of them, spanning a very large distance. i stopped again to take a photo, but my camera was not able to focus. this morning, i grabbed my binoculars and headed back to the same location to try and see what the area looked liked in the day. i didn't see anything unusual, but i did drive a little farther on the 238. i turned left at n ralston road, which is just west of the area i perceived the light to be hovering. on that road, i saw there is a milky way dairy. i just google-earthed the area, and it's very possible the many white lights i saw last night were from the dairy. but what the heck was that huge red light?
Summary: Large, stationary red/orange ball of light seen hovering around outskirts of Maricopa town
